Carlton Townsend

  1. Foster Name: Carlton
  2. Foster Family: Gust A. and Lillie A. Nelson
  3. Location of Family: Holdrege, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Holdrege, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1924-05-14
  8. Date of Death: 1940-09-24
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: Letter from sister Hazel Hansen (born Dorothy Townsend) attached.
  11. Source: Holdrege newspaper (unidentified), 10 November 1927; National Orphan Train Complex; OTR 113; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Sharon Becker Corres.; Find-A-Grave.
